attributes.additional_details:
The benefit system should only be for people who have paid in.
You should not be able to claim benefits if you are from another county as soon as you walk in. Get out what you pay in!!!
have it so if you you loose your job after 6 moths or made redundant you would be able to claim 6 months on benefits, not walk into the UK and claim benefits asap. This would save millions a year
